title: Night city driving with almost stopped ego vehicle and multiple braking events.
caption: A red car drives on a city street at night with a bus behind it.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving slowly on a city street at night. There are tall buildings on both sides of the street. A bus is following the red car. The road is wet and there are several other cars on the street. The traffic light is green.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because it is almost stopped. The bus behind the red car is following at a safe distance. The driver of the red car is being cautious due to the wet road conditions and the presence of other vehicles on the street. The green traffic light indicates that it is safe to continue driving.
